script.duplicate: The ClothCalc UserScript has been installed twice, with two different languages. You should disable one of the two languages for the UserScript to work properly.
script.description: The ClothCalc UserScript is a project created by the TW-DB.info team. It offers many features and extensions that will give you an improved gaming experience - saving your time and optimizing some of your activities.
script.paypal_alt: PayPal - The safest and easiest way to pay online!
script.api_registration_failed: Registration of the TW-DB.info UserScript with TheWestApi failed.
script.footer_copyright_html: .:powered by TW-DB Team:. | .:TW-DB.info:. | .:$version$ - BB:.
script.footer_window_html: .:powered by TW-DB Team:. | .:TW-DB.info:. | $version$ | BB

settings.save_to_reload: By pressing "Ok" the page will automatically refresh to apply your changes.
settings.title: Settings
settings.collector: Mark items in Trader and Market that you don't have in your inventory yet
settings.collector_sell: Add a button to sell all except one selected item in the Trader
settings.pin_items: Pin items in the Inventory window
settings.instant_quest: Complete a quest directly if all requirements are met
settings.colored_quest: Change the color of quests that can be completed
settings.job_lp: Add Labor Points to job windows
settings.task_points: Add Labor Points indicator and health points tips to Task List - [Bottom right]
settings.forts_import: Add fort battle import button from site (westforts)
settings.fort_recruit_enhanced: Enhance Recruitment tab before fort battle
settings.declare_report: Link battle axe unearthing report to the specific attack fort
settings.cemetery_critical: Critical hits and Ghost Rounds in fort cemetery
settings.battle_damage: Total damage dealt in each player's description during fort battle
settings.battle_round: Accurate hits, missed shots, hits taken and shot dodges per round
settings.building_progress: Show construction progress in a building window
settings.church_levels: Show additional church levels you can build
settings.church_tab: Show only buildings that are not fully constructed
settings.forum_blink: Remove Town button blinking if there is a new message in Town Forum
settings.market_reminder: Add a reminder for Market auctions
settings.market_sell: Enhance the sell window in Market
settings.market_report: Enhance the Report icon for sale in Market
settings.market_improved: Enhance the buy window in Market
settings.duel_motivation: Add a permanent indicator for Duel Motivation - [Below Energy indicator]
settings.sleep_direct: Add a button for direct transition to Hotel or Barracks
settings.deposit: Add a button for Money Deposit at the Bank you are at
settings.exp_bar: Add values to Experience Bar - Credits and thanks to (Leones/Slygoxx/Belle Bernice)
settings.mini_chat: Add a button to minimize Chat Rooms
settings.event_counter: Move event counter on large screens (Event Coin, Hiro&#39;s script)
settings.scrollbars_off: Disable scrollbars on small screens or when moving windows too far
settings.wear_close: Add a button to automatically close only Inventory windows
settings.profile_duel_exp: Show duel experience in player profiles
settings.regen_timers: Add regeneration timers to player portrait
settings.button_church: Add a button for easier opening of Church building window
settings.button_market: Add a button for easier opening of Market window
settings.bonus_jobs: Add option to show bonus jobs
settings.coordinates_input: Add option to move to specified coordinates
settings.work_queue_off: Disable notifications for Premium Automation purchase
settings.fetch_all_off: Disable Premium prompt when receiving items from market
settings.wof_nuggets_off: Disable Nuggets as default payment method in events (when available)
settings.auto_deposit: Add notification for deposit if you arrive in your town with money
settings.chest_analyzer: Add Chest Analyzer to Telegram/Reports window
settings.weekly_crafting: Add notification for crafting waiting period expiration
settings.telegram_bb_codes: Add a button to change to unformatted text in telegrams
settings.enhanced_rankings: Enhance Ranking tabs and add player difference
settings.translation_texts: Translation of specific incorrect text strings
settings.pin_important: Keep Menu, Experience and script line always at the top
settings.fortbattle_reminder: Disable the fort battle reminder at the left side
settings.night_mode: Dark Theme mode for The-West map
settings.blink_events: Stop the blinking of Events and Traveling Fair on the left side of the screen
settings.whisper_improved: Enhance Whisper sound in various Saloon chats (While the setting is enabled, you can listen and change the sound directly from the list below)

cache.reset_complete: Reset completed, the page will reload
cache.reset_confirm: Do you really want to reset the entire Cache of the tw-db UserScript?

io.export_copy_failed: Automatic copy failed or is not supported. Please manually copy the Settings from the box below.
io.import_paste_instructions: Please paste your Settings in the box below and press Import.
io.export_clipboard_success: Settings were automatically copied to clipboard.
io.import_warning: Warning: Importing settings will replace current settings. Have you read the warning?
io.import_no_data: No settings were entered in the box. Import cancelled.
io.import_json_preview: The following JSON will be imported:
io.import_error: Error importing settings. Check if the text is valid JSON.
io.import_clipboard_success: Settings were read from clipboard. Proceeding with import...
io.import_clipboard_error: Error in try/catch for clipboard read, enabling manual import:

updater.script_updated_message: The UserScript =1= has been updated. Do you want to see the Changelogs?
updater.new_version_available: A new version is available for the UserScript =1=, please click OK to update it.

market.sell_multiply: Setting (multiplication) of the current price by this number
market.sell_save_duration: Save duration and rights for future auctions

jobs.reset_jobs_bonus_confirm: Choose which category of jobs you want to reset or cancel the reset.

analyzer.reset_confirm_title: Do you really want to reset the Job Analyzer statistics?
analyzer.reset_confirm_message: Give the report link of the first report that should be read after the reset
analyzer.toggle_rewards_items: Toggle between rewards and items found

quests.cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel this quest?

building.progress: Show construction progress in a building window
building.progress_tooltip: Progress shows how much building is still needed for the building for the next level
building.improved_ch_tab: Show only buildings that are not fully constructed

map.coordinates_button: Move the map to the given coordinates

duel.levels_exp: Current duel experience you will gain: $min$ - $max$
duel.profile_duel_exp: Show duel experience in player profiles

banking.deposit_message: You have arrived in your town. Would you like to deposit your money?

collector.item_not_owned: You don't have this item yet

westforts.open_import: Open battle import in West Forts
westforts.close_import: Close battle import in West Forts

misc.telegram_toggle_tooltip: Toggle between unformatted message and original
